Author: lightfeathers
Text: I'm working on getting out of my toxic situation and I have an amazing supportive boyfriend, so I'm doing alright :)  Thanks so much! I really appreciate your kind words. I just wanted to post this hoping more people can understand why a community like /r/proED is important for our well being.

Author: UnderseaK
Text: Thank you for sharing your story! I'm so sorry that you've been through all of these things. I hope that you are safe from your abusers and have found some outside support. I know what you mean about proed being understanding. It was a place that was so free of judgment, and everyone was always so loving.   I totally understand feeling robbed and sad. Proed was everything to me some days when things were really bad. For what it's worth, if you need someone to talk to, you can feel free to pm me. I'm willing to listen, and I'm sure that there are a lot of other former members that are willing to listen too. Stay safe! <3
